comment: Dr. Dishman was quick to respond to emails & conducted video calls during office hours. He seemed to want to help as much as he could. However, he was a very slow grader (last week of class, only 2 of 10+ assignments graded), incredibly tough grader (one of the hardest I've had), went back on things mentioned in the syllabus. I wouldn't take again.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Group projects--Tough grader
